summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum (₹699) and RadianceReveal Vitamin C Serum (₹849) are two vitamin C serum options compared based on their price, concentration, key ingredients, and suitable skin types. GlowBoost stands out as the more affordable option, but RadianceReveal has a higher concentration of vitamin C. In terms of key ingredients, both products are tied, but suitable for different skin types.
verdict: We recommend GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum for those on a budget or with oily/combination skin, while RadianceReveal is suitable for those with all skin types and willing to invest in a higher concentration of vitamin C.
